item.description:
This event has been arranged by Ben S.

“To touch, to move, to inspire. This is the true gift of dance.”- Aubrey Lynch
“Dance like nobody’s looking.”
“A beautiful body, grace of line, graciousness of spirit, joy in the work, … – Lincoln Kirstein

Mark your calendar for September 15, 8PM for a dance you will not find anywhere else.

Invite your friends, bring guests.

Join us for an Elegant Evening of Dance, Friends, and self expression. The Fat City Band plays rhythm & blues, swing, jump blues, New Orleans gumbo and boogie woogie all meshing together in some smoky roadhouse jam session music that demands you have fun!

http://www.fatcityband.com/index.html http://www.myspace.com/thefatcityband

The Emerald Hall is a large dance venue with plenty of spaces to be seen and blend into the crowd. Sitz will provide hospitality with hot hors d’oeuvres and dessert. Dress like you mean it ~Suits/jackets & ties for men ~Cocktail attire for women. Refreshments will be served at the Cash Bar. Free Parkin

Guests $25. Paypal is not available for this event

Directions
Route 93/128 Exit 6, MA-37 South /Granite Street , Bear right at Five Corners, Granite St .9 miles, right onto Bay State Drive, 120 Bay State Drive is on the Left.

http://emeraldhall.com/contact_us.html
The Emerald Hall
120 Bay State Drive
Braintree, MA 02184
item.name: The Annual "Fall Fling" dance! with the FAT CITY Band!
